properties.areaDesc: Western Windham; Northern Berkshire; Bennington; Eastern Windham
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 13 at 4:09PM EST by NWS Albany NY
properties.description:
Patchy freezing drizzle is occurring across parts of southern
Vermont and the northern Berkshires. Although precipitation is
very light, temperatures near or just below freezing will allow
this light precipitation to freeze on contact with the ground.
This will result in any untreated surfaces to become slippery with
a thin coating of ice.

If traveling or walking through the early evening hours, keep in
mind that icy conditions are possible across the area. Use caution
and allow extra time to reach your destination.

NWSheadline: Patchy Freezing Drizzle Through The Early Evening Hours
